posts.post_content: looking for t206 bobby wallace sovereign 150, sovereign 350 apple green in lower condition or beaters thanks.

posts.post_title: No Wallace with Apple Green Sov 350 back
posts.post_content:
Fyi, Wallace is a No Print with the Apple (Light) Green Sovereign 350 back.  However, it is found with the Forest (Dark) Green Sovereign 350 back, as well as the Sovereign 150 back.

Best Regards and Happy Collecting  :)
Craig
